assertion.label: Change Details
assertion.name: change_details
assertion.value: In the original article publication, the affiliation of the author Ana Coutinho is incorrect.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: A. Dessein, H. Dessein, N. Duflot, and A. Romano are employees of BILHI genetics A. Dessein owns stock in BILHI Genetics and is a member of BILHI Genetics Scientific committee.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This work has received the approval of French and Brazilian Ethics Committees. Study subjects have given informed consent for their participation in this work.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
